item.title: Vedanta: The ancient wisdom
item.description: What is this post about? In this article we’ll go over the Vedantic philosophy at a very high-level. This amazing and ancient philosohy is thousands of years old and is viewed as the most complete understanding of life and nature. What is Vedanta What are the key concepts in Vendanta What is the central philosophy in Advaita Vedanta What are the four paths to self-realization? How should we practice these paths in everyday life?
